ModMetaData.name: I Love Big Guns
ModMetaData.author: Killface
ModMetaData.description:
Big Gun Mod
This mod modifies the visible size of weapons, with magnifications of 140 % and 200 %. See options for details.
The default plane10 is exchanged with plane14 or plane20, thus enlarging all weapons.
This is done via a transpiler for DrawEquipmentAiming
Possibly not compatible with all mods which cancel the execution of DrawEquipmentAiming or alter it in not recognizable ways.
Powered by Harmony.
